Jx.Store.Protocol.Ajax

Extends: Jx.Store.Protocol

This protocol is used to send and receive data via AJAX.  It also has the capability to use a REST-style API.

License

This file is licensed under an MIT style license

Summary
Jx.Store.Protocol.AjaxExtends: Jx.Store.Protocol
Options
requestOptionsOptions to pass to the mootools Request class
restFlag indicating whether this protocol is operating against a RESTful web service
urlsThis is a hash of the urls to use for each method.
queuean object containing options suitable for <Request.Queue>.
dataPropertyan string that represent the name of the property in the response that holds the data.
Functions
readSend a read request via AJAX
insertTakes a Jx.Record instance and saves it
updateTakes a Jx.Record and updates it via AJAX
deleteTakes a Jx.Record and deletes it via AJAX
abortaborts the request related to the passed in response.

Options

requestOptions

Options to pass to the mootools Request class

rest

Flag indicating whether this protocol is operating against a RESTful web service

urls

This is a hash of the urls to use for each method.  If the rest option is set to true the only one needed will be the urls.rest.  These can be overridden if needed by passing an options object into the various methods with the appropriate urls.

queue

an object containing options suitable for <Request.Queue>.  By default, autoAdvance is set to true and concurrent is set to 1.

dataProperty

an string that represent the name of the property in the response that holds the data.  By default, the value is set to ‘data’.

Functions

read

read: function (options)

Send a read request via AJAX

Parameters

optionsthe options to pass to the request.

options)

Takes a Jx.Record instance and saves it

Takes a Jx.Record and updates it via AJAX

options)

Takes a Jx.Record and deletes it via AJAX

Parameters

abort

abort: function (response)

aborts the request related to the passed in response.

Parameters

responsethe response with the request to abort
